name: d3-sunburst-chart
description: D3 Plugin that draws sunburst charts.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,d3-collection:d3,d3-dispatch:d3,d3-format:d3,d3-hierarchy:d3,d3-scale:d3,d3-selection:d3,d3-shape:d3,d3-transition:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/sunburst.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: browserify build/sunburst.js > build/sunburst-bundle.js && uglifyjs build/sunburst-bundle.js -c -m -o build/sunburst.min.js && cp build/sunburst-bundle.js ../inst/htmlwidgets/sunburst.js
